data.eml:eml: Two new species of Sphaeronemoura (Plecoptera: Nemouridae) from Yunnan Province of China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Qian, Yu-Han, Fu, Li, Jiao, Jun-Ying, Du, Yu-Zhou (2019): Two new species of Sphaeronemoura (Plecoptera: Nemouridae) from Yunnan Province of China. Zootaxa 4568 (1): 194-200, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4568.1.13
